original_title: Teddy Rhyme Time: Adventures in Nursery Rhyme Land
overview: An enchanting story of two teddies who magically come to life when their human "Huggy Friends" go to sleep, Once 'awake', Max and Mimms make their way to the children's toy box which, when opened, reveals a magical staircase to a world full of Nursery Rhymes and adorable teddy bear characters.
title: Teddy Rhyme Time: Adventures in Nursery Rhyme Land
